title: Spaghetti Bolognese
ingredients: Spaghetti, Ground beef, Tomato sauce, Onion, Garlic, Olive oil, Salt, Pepper
instructions: Cook spaghetti. In another pan, cook beef with onion and garlic, add tomato sauce and season. Combine and serve.

title: Pancakes
ingredients: Flour, Milk, Eggs, Sugar, Baking powder, Salt, Butter
instructions: Mix dry ingredients. Add milk and eggs. Stir into batter. Cook on greased skillet until golden brown.

title: Chicken Stir-Fry
ingredients: Chicken breast, Bell peppers, Broccoli, Soy sauce, Garlic, Ginger, Oil
instructions: Cut chicken and veggies. Stir-fry garlic, ginger, chicken, then veggies. Add soy sauce. Cook until done.
